metadata.title: CVE-2018-19887 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in the huffcodefunction (libfaac/huff2.c) in Freeware Advanced Audio Coder (FAAC)1.29.9.2. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and applicationcrash, which leads to denial of service in the book 4 case.

criterions.comment: faac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
